plugins.name: dd-trace-dotnet
plugins.description: Commands and context for developing the Datadog .NET APM Tracer. Includes build, test, integration creation, and troubleshooting tools.

plugins.name: dd-trace-dotnet-azure-functions
plugins.description: Azure Functions-specific commands for Datadog .NET tracer development. Includes NuGet building, deployment, testing, and debugging tools. Install alongside dd-trace-dotnet.
